item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello! I’m Iain Bromley, and I will be a software engineer at Visa this fall. I just recieved my Bachelors degree from the Information School at the University of Washington. I love learning about new technologies, developing solutions to challenging problems, and changing lives with information (okay, maybe not that last one). Also, I have a penchant for transportation networks and their respective infrastructure, specifically in the Greater Seattle Area. If you’re intersted or want to connect, feel free to reach out!
